ing: 1/2 teaspoon garlic salt, or more to taste
n: Quinoa Tofu Super-Soup for Cold Season
des: "I created this soup from a list of healthy super-foods to eat during flu/cold season to boost the immune system. It is simple to make and doesn't take much energy if you're already under the weather."
ins: Combine chicken broth, water, and quinoa in a saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer. Add tofu, kale, carrots, red bell pepper, and garlic salt to soup; simmer until quinoa is translucent and outer rim has spiraled away from the seed, 15 to 20 minutes.
